meanings.sent1: The chortlers at the party couldn't stop laughing.
meanings.sent2: I heard a group of chortlers enjoying a joke in the park.
meanings.sent3: The chortlers in the comedy club made the whole audience burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The chortlers in the room were like a symphony of joyous sounds.
meanings.sent5: The image of the chortlers' smiling faces stayed with me all day.

meanings.sent1: We could hear the chortlers from across the street.
meanings.sent2: The chortlers in the movie theater added to the fun atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The chortlers in the library were shushed by the librarian.
meanings.sent4: The chortlers in the crowd were like a chorus of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the chortlers echoed through the hallways.
